urlText: Roseville Station Commuter Car Park temporary closure
content: From Monday 3 August 2020 the Roseville Station Commuter Car Park will be closed for approximately 16 months while station upgrades take place.
subtitle: Roseville Station Commuter Car Park temporary closure

content: From Thursday 8 April to Wednesday 30 June, the stairs between Town Hall station and street level will gradually close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff.
subtitle: Town Hall station stairs upgrade

urlText: Gymea Station lift upgrade - between platform and street level
content: The lift between the platform and Gymea Bay Road is closed due to upgrade works. If you’re unable to use the stairs, use the lifts available at Kirrawee or Miranda stations. If you need further assistance, see station staff or call 9522 1288.
subtitle: Gymea Station lift upgrade - between platform and street level

urlText: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works
content:
Platforms 16-23
Platform re-levelling and re-tiling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.
There will be changes to the floor surface in different areas of each platform, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

Hoarding will also be adjusted on each platform to facilitate the progression of Sydney Metro construction works.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

Change to boarding assistance location
Platform 16, 17, 20, 21
If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info

Stair, escalator and lift upgrade works from 11 January to end-December 2021
The escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 light rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works.

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 – 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 – 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry.

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

You can view a map of the station here.
subtitle: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works

properties.speechText: There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.
